Generation V.Black: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet .
Generation V.White: When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. This Pokémon targets Shelmet .
Generation V.Black 2: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet .
Generation V.White 2: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet .

Generation VI.X: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet .
Generation VI.Y: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet .
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet .
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet .

Generation VIII.Sword: Its strange physiology reacts to electrical energy in interesting ways. The presence of a Shelmet will cause this Pokémon to evolve.
Generation VIII.Shield: It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through Shelmet 's shell. Karrablast doesn't eat the shell— it eats only the contents.

Generation V.White 2: Routes 6 and 11 Route 8 , Icirrus City , Moor of Icirrus Spring Summer Autumn
